TopicTitle: Conic patch draw mode (or: did they just renamed something?)

Articles.Content:
I know about this https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/11297-different-conic-drawing-modes/, but is "LERPED mode" what is now called "dynamic mode"?

Also, what is "conic patch limit"?

Conic patch limit is the number of SOIs that will be displayed. If your ship is flying through 10 SOIs in its orbit but you have the conic patch limit set to 3, then the game will only show orbital segments through the first 3 SOIs.
